column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went here on a Thursday night for dinner.  We ordered the Spanish Ceasar Salads
column2: Papas Alioli and the Butcher's Paella.  It was all very good.  The service was perfect and our waiter even brought us out a complimentary dessert even though we told him we were full! The music was great-a mix of Bandoleros and Ojos de Brujo.  Can't go wrong with music like that!
